sentences.en: Abstract: Polyphosphazenes are inorganic polymeric functional materialsthat have unique characterization.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 聚磷腈是一类具有特殊性能的无机高分子功能材料.

sentences.en: Antimicrobial agents may be in form of inorganic, organic or natural biological.
sentences.cn: 抗菌剂包括无机 、 有机和天然生物抗菌剂三大类型.

sentences.en: Both inorganic and organic surfaces constitute the soil adsorption complex.
sentences.cn: 无机和有机表面组成土壤吸附复合体.

sentences.en: Humus is dead, decaying organic matter. NOT inorganic fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 腐殖质是已死的 、 腐烂中的有机物质. 而不是无机肥料.

sentences.en: In general, an inorganic residue is much more detrimental to the operation of the waveguide.
sentences.cn: 一般, 无机残留物对波导使用的危害要大得多.

sentences.en: Most, if not all fungi can dispense with inorganic sources.
sentences.cn: 即使不是全部亦是大多数真菌可省去无机氮源.

sentences.en: Organic - inorganic nanometer compound material have concurrently characteristic of inorganic - organic matter.
sentences.cn: 有机 - 无机纳米复合材料兼有无机和有机物的特点.

sentences.en: Organic fertilizers offer a variety of nutrients not found in inorganic fertilizers.
sentences.cn: 有机肥料提供了无机肥料中找不到的许多营养.
岩石和矿物都是无机物.

sentences.en: The balance was carbonaceous fraction , the nonflammable inorganic fraction was negligible.
sentences.cn: 其余为不挥发的可燃物碳粒, 不可燃的无机物极少.

sentences.en: The fundamentals of inorganic chemistry are very important.
sentences.cn: 无机化学的基础很重要.

sentences.en: There is the potential of uptake of soil, inorganic nitrogen by the roots of the semi - parasite.
sentences.cn: 半 寄生的根系有可能吸取土壤的无机氮.

sentences.en: This chemical plant recently bought a large quantity of inorganic salt.
sentences.cn: 这家化工厂又买进了大量的无机盐.

sentences.en: Useful drugs are made from inorganic substances or are plant and animal by - product .
sentences.cn: 有用的药物是由无机物质制成的,或者是植物和动物的 副产品.

sentences.en: You have kept the organic and the inorganic chemicals separate, I am sure.
sentences.cn: 相信你已把有机化学品和无机化学品分开包装.

phrases.tran_cn: 无机化学；无机化学材料

trans.tran_cn: [化]无机的，无组织结构的，无生物的，无活力的
trans.tran_en: not consisting of anything that is living
